title: 1st Global Forum on the Ethics of AI

kpi_list.kpi_text: Establish a robust ethical framework for AI governance by 2025.
kpi_list.target_description: Establish a robust ethical framework for AI governance

kpi_list.kpi_text: Increase public awareness of AI ethics by 40% by 2026 through educational campaigns.
kpi_list.target_description: Increase public awareness of AI ethics
kpi_list.measurement_method: Surveys and assessments of public awareness

kpi_list.kpi_text: Train 500 policymakers on AI ethics by 2024.
Develop international cooperation agreements on AI ethics with at least 10 countries by 2025.
kpi_list.target_description: Develop international cooperation agreements on AI ethics

kpi_list.kpi_text: Publish an annual report on AI ethics compliance by 2023.
kpi_list.target_description: Publish an annual report on AI ethics compliance

kpi_list.kpi_text: Enhance transparency in AI algorithms by implementing disclosure standards by 2025.
kpi_list.target_description: Implement disclosure standards for AI algorithms

kpi_list.kpi_text: Establish a public consultation process on AI ethics by 2024.
kpi_list.target_description: Establish a public consultation process on AI ethics

kpi_list.kpi_text: Create a certification program for ethical AI developers by 2026.
kpi_list.target_description: Create a certification program for ethical AI developers

top_actors.name: United Nations
top_actors.justification: The United Nations is a key player in global discussions on ethics, particularly in the context of AI, as it often facilitates international dialogue and sets frameworks for ethical standards.

top_themes.name: AI Ethics
top_themes.justification: AI Ethics is the central theme of the document, as it directly addresses the ethical considerations and implications of artificial intelligence, which is the primary focus of the forum.
